steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Select the text or object that you want to copy.
Press Ctrl+C on your keyboard to copy the selected content.
Navigate to the location where you want to paste the copied content.
Press Ctrl+V on your keyboard to paste the copied content.
To cut the selected content instead of copying, press Ctrl+X on your keyboard.
To clear the clipboard and remove all copied content, press Ctrl+Shift+F7 on your keyboard.
